ModMetaData.name: ZeroTech-Faction (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: LingLuo
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of LingLuos mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2208716840
- Faction is no longer permanent enemy of the Empire
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/ZeroTechFaction][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Zero Tech-faction expansion pack Chaos? Killing? No, those things are no longer what we are pursuing. In the face of the pursuit of technology, all those who disrupt order are unforgivable! Introduction Moonlight Blessed: A powerful faction, they admire technology, despise the old school guys, and seem to be more friendly to you...
Language: Simplified Chinese Sharing Agreement:MIT Giturl https://github.com/LingLuo39/ZeroTech/
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
